dataList.content: You could've given your crew a chance!
A chance to see for themselves where they stood...!
Always in my wake... are pallid, opaque traces.
You say that I stole their chances? Wrong. They merely followed in my wake, setting their course to the same destination as mine.
Because had they not done so, they could not have endured this world. Because they were weak! I was their lighthouse in this world of tempest... I gave them an unambiguous path to follow!
The last of my sailors! By me! Heed my orders! Pursue them!
